entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Memory leak in System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream #69411
  • [API Proposal]: System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.BrowserSynchronizationContext #69409
    7.0.0
  • Failure in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexIgnoreCaseTests.Unicode_IgnoreCase_Tests #69406
  • LINQ performance: `Count` is twice slower than `Where.Count` #69405
  • [API Proposal]: New custom type marshaller features for pay-for-play features #69403
  • Have more C++ intrinsics usage in runtime and JIT #69401
  • Mono should correctly support the packing requirements for ABI primitive types #69399
  • Cancellation on NetworkStream.ReadAsync closes local connection but remote server end-point still seems to be connected #69397
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 4 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #69396
    7.0.0
  • Microsof.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions version 6+ is not verifiable #69395
  • [wasm] Int64 marshaling is corrupting data which could not fit JS `Number` #69394
  • Crash on using Expression.Compile() in a release mode (iOS). #69410
  • Failure in SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits: The server returned an invalid or unrecognized response #69387
    7.0.0
  • Compiled regex hangs and finally fails for stack-intensive regex pattern #69381
    7.0.0
  • createdump on AKS + Linux doesn't work correctly unless running in a shell #69380

Closed

  • Bogus context name in InvalidCastException message #69341
  • Test failure LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.Compiles.ValidateSnippetsFallbackForwarder(source: \"\\r\\nusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;\\r\\nusing\"..., targetFramework: Framework, expectFallbackForwarder: True) #69289
    7.0.0
  • System.AccessViolationException in System.Exception.ToString() #59077
    7.0.0
  • [Linux, CoreCLR, dbgshim] "AddressSanitizer: alloc-dealloc-mismatch (operator new [] vs operator delete)" on ICorDebugThread::GetActiveFrame() call. #62281
    7.0.0
  • Add strict validation to System.IO.Compression.GZipStream #47563
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/tailcall_v4/hijacking/hijacking.cmd #68884
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.NTAuthenticationTests.NtlmSignatureTest on Mono on MacCatalyst #69309
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 3 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #67976
  • Creating StackTrace instance breaks Stack Overflow detection #69384
  • [wasm][debugger] Small refactoring suggested in 65842 #66068
  • ComWrappers: are there any (Roslyn) Source Generators planned? #59651
    7.0.0
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.Compiles.ValidateSnippetsFallbackForwarder(source: \"\\nusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;\\n\\nnamespa\"..., targetFramework: Standard, expectFallbackForwarder: False) #62467
    7.0.0
  • DllImportGenerator.UnitTests failure: The type or namespace name 'DllImportAttribute' could not be found #64586
    7.0.0
  • "[MSBuild]::VersionGreaterThanOrEquals(preview, 5.0)" failures on local build/test/VS #69392
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for converting to/from `IntPtr` for some handles #67090
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'link' in 'System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionServices:TryExportMetadataForMember(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,byref)' #68513
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add (Try)Parse methods to System.Numerics.Complex #69388
  • WildcardPathSegment does not properly honor provided StringComparison #68942
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Separate public, private and internal structure properties #63082
  • .net 9 or .net 8.x.x #69383
  • Regressions in System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTests #68408
    7.0.0
  • Reconsider normal/no_tiered_compilation jobs #69122

PullRequests

Created

  • Add some assertions to Stream.Read in System.Text.Encoding.CodePages #69414
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Fix several regex loop issues #69413
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Optimize ManifestResourceStream.Read(Span<byte>) #69412
    area-System.Reflection
  • Cleanup some X509 PAL allocations #69408
    area-System.Security
  • Add TranslateKey to PartitionedRateLimiter #69407
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Add support for marshalling signed/unsigned boolean types. #69402
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Delete ClrDirectoryEnumerator #69400
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Iterative generic math changes to match API review #69391
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add typed and untyped CreateObject to JsonTypeInfo #69390
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix some scaling issues with the global queue in the thread pool #69386
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Add correct assembly context name to InvalidCastException message #69346
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.Compiles.ValidateSnippetsFallbackForwarder #69398
    test-bug
  • [release/6.0] Add windows runtime packs as a workload #69393
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.x
  • Fix ASAN violation under Samsung's netcoredbg #69339
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Workaround crash in Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native #68990
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • [release/6.0] Restore FP pairs when unwinding in ARM64 #69359
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.6
  • Move MsQuicStream._streamId into MsQuicStream.State #69382
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • remove internal socket exception from NameResolution #69270
    area-System.Net
  • avoid allocationg ApplicationProtocol in common case #69098
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Removal of IBC infrastructure #68717
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update signing of JS files #69366
  • [release/6.0] Docker fixes for the enterprise linux testing pipeline #68913
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68934
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Remove CngKeyLite #69376
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Fix memory leak at AssemblyLoadContext unload #69334
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Prevent debugger deadlock with code versioning logic #68367
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [wasm] Fix debug proxy when used with blazor #69342
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove most usages of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update ActiveIssue on NtlmSignatureTest #69389
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Refactor: narrow down SdbHelper responsibility #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add `IntPtr` conversion APIs for some runtime handles #69363
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Only fold Type.op_Equality calls before morphing args #69367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • support only Ordinal comparison inside WildcardPathSegment #69079
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well #66594
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add OpenTelemetry with Geneva exporter to NetCoreServer used for testing #69304
    area-System.Net

Updated

  • Address some System.Formats.Tar TODOs (infra and syscalls) #69107
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix for GetMemberWithSameMetadataDefinitionAs #69284
    area-System.Reflection
  • fix GetContentAsync_ErrorStatusCode_ExpectedExceptionThrown test #69228
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation #68835
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make json source generation cancellable #69332
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Adding Int128 and UInt128 with a base software implementation #69204
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] First attempt at a wasm app host #68696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Apply MaxResponseHeadersLength limit to trailing headers #69250
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Remove the pid argument on Windows createdump only take dumps of the parent process #68877
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add Ubuntu 22.04 to libraries CI run #67345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #61140
    area-System.Threading, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Run host tests with dotnet test and enable crash/hang dumps #69340
    area-Host
  • Use IntegralRange in fgOptimizeRelationalComparisonWithCasts #69247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Make unroll code for cpblk non-interruptible #69202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • remove duplicate Connect logic from TcpClient #67951
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add more char.Is* helpers for common ASCII sets #69318
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add `BStrStringMarshaller` to source generator #69213
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Wasm conditional audit + remove CompileFunction #69283
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Use intrinsic for genLog2() #69333
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm][debugger] Added null safety on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Minimal diagnostic tracing configuration and sample #69158
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • Gather 'Tellurium' team issues in team project #68193
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Add {M}IBC to glossary #68111
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Additional work for x86 support for NativeAOT #68130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use a faster sort algorithm pdqsort for Array.Sort #68436
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Initial plumbing for JsonTypeInfoResolver #69316
    area-System.Text.Json
  • WIP: [Mono] Fix initial 4244 warnings. #69236
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reduce max shared memory object name length #68541
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Support ref fields in `System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.BlobEncoder`. #69378
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Fixed work with QUIC_BUFFER #69351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Pass Vector128 in SIMD registers #68991
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Allow the inliner to substitute for small arguments #69068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [monoapi] Add MONO_IMAGE_NOT_SUPPORTED to MonoImageOpenStatus #69062
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add EvaluationResult Scheme for arrays. #67095
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Switch checked coreclr + libraries tests configs around in PRs #69180
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix r4 r8 numbers #66979
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add AppContext data support for DefaultMaxConnectionsPerServer #68952
    area-System.Net.Http
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Send Hot Reload message from C# in own app to browser reload script #25466
  • Workloads: Feed authentication during install doesn't seem to work at all on macOS #25458
    6.0.4xx
  • Docker buildx with linux/arm64 fails in AzureDevOps since 6.0.300 update #25452
  • AnalysisLevel preview setting is missing tests #25450
    7.0.1xx
  • Math.Pow behaviour difference (.Net Framework/.Net Core) #25447
  • Problems in .NET 6 Cross Platform Build for win, linux and mac(x64 & arm64) #25446
  • System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception (0x80090308): The token supplied to the function is invalid" when TLS13 is enabled #25442
  • mongodb-org-server depends on libssl1.1 (>= 1.1.1); however: Package libssl1.1 is not installed. #25441

Closed

  • Incompatible change to NuGet package resolution #25444
  • Error building since VS 17.2.0 / 6.0.300 / package resolve conflict issue #25445

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25467
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add tests to cover the resolution of AnalysisLevel known-strings #25454
    Area-NetSDK
  • Remove duplicated PackageReference #25443
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Enable signature checks in the package downloader #25395
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads
  • Fix EffectiveAnalysisLevel referring to unset prop #25449
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25409
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #25434
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Support suppressing transitive framework reference downloads, and other changes #25358
  • Switch the last non-helix test over to running on helix. #25324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable the 4.8.1 target in sdk style projects #25393
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.NET.Compatibility.Common.targets #25132
    Area-Compatibility
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1773443 #25346
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25403
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21539
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Covariant Return Types" (VS 16.8, .NET 5) #49
    9.0
  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Spec out numeric IntPtr #6031

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adjust `ITypeSymbol.IsSignedIntegralType` and related APIs for numeric IntPtr #61350
    17.3
  • Incorrect code analysis: IDE0059 Unnecessary assignment of a vlue to 'variable' #61347
    Backlog
  • Convert to interpolated string adds (object) to everything #61346
    17.3
  • IntelliSense/Auto-complete off-by-one on overload count on members of lambda argument objects #61343
  • "Move to <type>.cs" operation should open the new file in the editor #61340
  • "Generate constructor" doesn't work on records #61338

Closed

  • User-defined conversion does not work on Generics of interfaces #61339
  • Workspace.Dispose throwing on shutdown trying to instantiate MEF components during the MEF container disposable #61140
    17.3
  • C# code crashes C# syntax highlighting and causes editor to act erratically. #61348
  • error CS0518: Predefined type 'System.Object' is not defined or imported #12393
    Backlog
  • `Convert to 'Program.Main' style program` should keep leading trivia inside `Main` method #61126
  • Smart string escape on paste broken with line copy/paste #61316

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations in DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader.ReadToEnd #61351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Removed unintentional `WorkItem`s #61349
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Adjust conversion from nuint to float/double #61345
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61294
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix null ref in Razor excerpt service #61342
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Keep leading trivia inside Main method… #61178
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix test failures in features/semi-auto-props #61344
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove document options provider #61228
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not try to do a smart copy/paste when the paste change is not fully within the string. #61317
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change VB language version Roslyn.sln uses to "latest" #61313
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove PROTOTYPE comments #61322
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Merge 'main' into DefaultInterfaceImplementation #61323
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61337
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61352
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • WIP: Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid caching indentation data that changes over time #61304
    Area-IDE
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Bump macos workload to RC3 #61250
    Area-IDE
  • Better completions in generic constraints #61335
    Area-IDE, Community
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow skeletons to be reused in frozen-partial scenarios (for inheritance margin) #61286
    Area-IDE
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Support LSP services associated with LSP server instances (with lifetimes that match). #61266
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Add missing node state transition #61308
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Parse `unchecked` gracefully in operators #61309
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • ignore top level statements from move static member refactoring #61227
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor bindings broken by cascading value #41700
  • W3CLogger Custom Fields #41698
  • TestHost response body does not support 0-byte reads #41692
    6.0.x
  • Apparent memory leak passing large data to javascript to download via link. #41691

Closed

  • TypedHeader has linker unfriendly logic #24724
    7.0.0
  • DataProtection isn't linker friendly #24705
    7.0-preview5
  • UseRateLimiter API deviates by the Action-based config approach #41655
  • Allow Use of IConfigureOptions Consistently Everywhere #39251
    .NET 7 Planning
  • After installing 6.0.5 update, 6.0.4 Blazor app Windows service stops #41664
  • Detect public properties that will fail when databinding a SelectList #41680
  • Dynamic Cookie.Domain in cookie middleware #41678
  • SignalR es5 #41419
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Favor parameter name in route pattern when available #41701
  • Handle multiple response annotations for the same status code in OpenApi #41699
  • Update SDK #41697
    area-infrastructure
  • Try deleting installer dir #41693
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix templates sourceName & port of template fixes from main #41536
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.6
  • Enable trimming on remaining middleware and security projects #41688
    area-security, area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `e357a5f` to `1b22ae8` #41694
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4348d4e` to `5126f71` #41695
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add trimming annotations to DotNetObjectReference #41610
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-jsinterop
  • Update duende versions to 6.0.4 #41370
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to install lldb-3.9 in Debian #3078
  • High CPU overhead monitoring AppSvcAppLogs in App Services #3073
    Future

Closed

  • High CPU overhead monitoring AppSvcAppLogs in App Services #3074
    Future
  • 'dotnet-dump analyze' crashes when loading core dump #3003
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Proposal] Add dotnet-trace report stat and report script command #2988
    enhancement, dotnet-trace

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make the Button Image/Text Layout the same by default for all platforms #7240
  • Fix WinUI resource loading so if users replace resource keys in the platform App.Xaml file those will take precedence #7239
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Border does not draw on android #7238
  • CollectionView crashes/behaves weird when ObservableCollection updated quickly #7237
  • MauiImage resource not displaying #7234
  • Windows Machine keeps saying Type '/' to search from your saved info #7233
  • Long Project Name breaks layout in new MAUI Blazor App #7231
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Shell SizeChanged event not invoked / Size not set #7227
  • Label LineHeight causes bad layout under iOS #7222
  • Android - Excessive space on the right side of Grid #7221
  • Android FormattedText and LineHeights are not correct #7220
    6.0.300-servicing
  • The character set provided in ContentType is invalid 'windows-1253' #7218
  • iOS - Frame not resizing. #7217
  • Release build of sample app fails when startup page replaced with simple NavigationPage (Android) #7214

Closed

  • AbsoluteLayout not always setting child position and size as requested. #6500
    6.0.300-servicing
  • xaml grid content on windows not fit (stretch) after window maximize (or after window size increase with mouse borders drag) #6714
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Cannot edit a RESX file, designer loader failed #7232
  • WindowsForms with BlazorWebView control throws error in evergreen runtime using version 6.0.300-rc.3.5667 #7169
  • [Windows] App icon doesn't show in window title #7201
  • Navigation.PushModalAsync page shows underlying page #7230
  • Border clipping issue #7211
  • [Android] MAUI Border class will clip StrokeShape #7103
  • RadioBox with ControlTemplate of only ContentPresenter #5758
    6.0.300-servicing
  • MediaPicker.PickPhotoAsync() messes up my Binding #7193
  • MAUI Windows Machine Developer Mode #7187
  • [Android] Icon not found if called something else than appicon #7202
  • Accent color can't be overwritten like in WinUI 3 #7208
  • Graphics engine desktop #7212
  • Any plan to Support LG webOS ? #7213
  • The Name property of a focusable element must not be null. #6290
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Two heading level 1 is present in hello world page #6261
    6.0.300-servicing
  • MAUI does not respect iOS MasksToBounds when set within handler (regression from XF) #7216
  • [BUG] Label with FormattedText ignores FontSize #7210

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup cake file, add targets, fix for iOS Pair #7241
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Allow LayoutView to pass touches to child controls when CascadeInputTransparent is false #7236
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #7235
  • Fix Project Template Dark colors #7226
    area/templates 📄
  • Added pending lifecycle events hooks #7225
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0 #7224
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0 #7223
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix Android FormattedText and related platforms #7219
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300-servicing
  • [Android] Fix Button CornerRadius issue #7215
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • Allow AbsoluteLayout children to auto size when height/width are not proportional #7183
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1210.30 to 1.0.1210.39 #6991
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQL Server Analytic functions #28037
  • Optimize constant arithmetic in post-translation #28036
  • Error when try to configure optional owned entity with nested required owned entity #28030

Closed

  • Simple projection "cannot be translated" #28038
  • Consider setting NullabilityInfoContextSupport=true in EF's NuGet package #27474
    6.0.6
  • Cosmos Db First query always shows very slow performance compared to subsequent queries. #28027

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Castle.Core from 4.4.1 to 5.0.0 #28035
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Improve SQL Server IndexOf translation and change tests to use Where #28031

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Force NullabilityInfoContextSupport=true in user projects #27916
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.6
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #28034
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Capitalize database name #27966
  • Remove Convert node when up-casting to an interface #27964
    propose-close
